segments.text: I see the water overflowing and creating a river on the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, it's almost unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, reaching into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being really clever, positioning herself to catch any falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's on the verge of collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted by the mess the water is making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is in disarray, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of potential disasters, it's hard to look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in and fixes things before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
